article: on the final day of a campaign notable for its harsh invective and political hyperbole , sen. charles s. robb and his republican challenger , oliver l. north , crossed virginia monday trying to paint their fight for the senate as a referendum on the future of the country .
abstract: robb on the offensive on last day of virginia senate race
